2.2.description: Run Linux shell scripts or specify the path to a script to run. This plugin only runs on Linux operating systems.

runCommand.description: Specify the commands to run or the path to an existing script on the instance.

timeoutSeconds.description: The time in seconds for a command to be completed before it is considered to have failed. When the timeout is reached, Systems Manager stops the command execution.

workingDirectory.description: The path to the working directory on your instance.
